Install Pyroglancer¶

There are two ways to install Pyroglancer.

  1. You can get the stable version from pypi like below. On the command line, enter:

    pip3 install pyroglancer

  2. You can get the latest development version like below. On the command line, enter:

    pip3 install git+git://github.com/SridharJagannathan/pyroglancer@master

Note

If you are having trouble in installing, please don’t hesitate to ask
